title: Integrated Library Services Project for Online Math Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students collaborate in teams on math projects in a BYOD environment, integrating research data collection and analysis processes with library information literacy experts

learning_goals: Collaborate with team members to define a mathematical modeling problem and identify/select at least three relevant academic resources from a library database.
Use an online library system to explore and apply at least two statistical data/simulation tools for solving mathematical problems.
Verify information sources against evaluation criteria and compile a reference list in APA format with 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
